cells.content: A realm at 550 or higher PPT.
Someone asking for gold donations for a commander tag.
A single player being chased by 5 or more enemies.
Commander raging at his followers.
A realm at 10 or lower PPT.
A Thief affected by a Stealth Trap.
An enemy player channelling a skill point.
Level 80 food dropped in the middle of nowhere.
A player with a Commander Tag AFK in the field.
A golem trying to use its Fire Spin on a gate.
A bunch of siege blueprint bundles making a shape on the ground.
An uplevel character taking a golem on a stroll by himself.
An enemy Norn using the Snow Leopard Form charge skill to run away.
Three or more players dead at the bottom of a cliff.
An ArenaNet employee in a blob.
A longbow Ranger in a guild raid.
Commander Siegerazer/Crusher dead.
A player wielding Meteorlogicus.
An uplevel in the Obsidian Sanctum duelling area.
Receive an angry PM from an enemy player.
A dead Mesmer in the inner room of a keep or castle.
A zerg capturing Bloodlust.
Megablob trying to break a door down with no siege.
An enemy player wiping to NPCs while trying to solo a camp.
A naked player in a blob.
A Warrior using Whirling Axe.
Three maps queued at the same time.
A dead Thief in the inner room of a keep or castle.
A realm at 420 PPT.
Five or more Arrow Carts in a row.
An enemy dancing, sitting, or laughing on your corpse.
A Spirit Ranger.
A player wielding Rodgort.
Three or more guild recruitment messages in a row.
An enemy in a megablob bowing on your lone corpse.
A player wielding The Minstrel.
A human Thief with Incinerator and Quip running from a fight.
A blob in the skritt or centaur camps.
Three or more commander tags in the same spot.
An Arrow Cart on the top floor of Stonemist.
A player standing in the invincibility zone while enemies try to attack him or her.
A player dead to Legendary Defenders (base defense NPCs.)
An enemy solo-defending a fully-upgraded tower with an Arrow Cart or Ballista.
A bearbow Ranger.
An enemy with a taunting guild name.
An enemy using a racial skill.
Open-field Arrow Cart.
Someone portalling the Obsidian Sanctum jumping puzzle.
A player alive inside an enemy spawn area.
Golems at Water Gate on any Keep.
